titles: A discourse vpon the reasons of the resolution taken in the Valteline against the tyranny of the Grisons and heretiques To the most mighty Catholique King of Spaine, D. Phillip the Third. VVritten in Italian by the author of the Councell of Trent. And faithfully translated into English. With the translators epistle to the Commons House of Parliament.
Discorso sopra le ragioni della resolutione fatta in Val Telina contra la tirannide de' Grisoni & heretici.. English
author: Sarpi, Paolo, 1552-1623.
Roe, Thomas, Sir, 1581?-1644.
Philo-Britannicos.
publisher: Printed [by Miles Flesher] for William Lee, at the Turkes head in Fleetstreet, next to the Miter and Phœnix,
notes: A translation of: Sarpi, Paolo.  Discorso sopra le ragioni della resolutione fatta in Val Telina contra la tirannide de' Grisoni & heretici.
Translator's epistle to Parliament signed: Philo-Britannicos, i.e. Sir Thomas Roe.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
keywords: Valtellina Valley (Italy) --  History --  16th century --  Early works to 1800.
